pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-Expression Analysis of Spatial Transcriptomics Data // Analyzes spatial transcriptomic data using cells-by-genes and cell location matrices to find gene pairs that coordinate their expression between spatially adjacent cells. It enables quantitative analysis and graphical assessment of these cross- expression patterns. See Sarwar et al. (2025) doi:10.1101/2024.09.17.613579 and https://github.com/gillislab/CrossExpression/ for more details.
